trans-unit.source: Defines the size, in number of statements, of the database statement cache (prepared statements kept in memory).

seg-source.mrk: Defines the size, in number of statements, of the database statement cache (prepared statements kept in memory).

target.mrk: Defines the size, in number of statements, of the database statement cache (prepared statements kept in memory).

trans-unit.source: This property controls the number of precompiled statements which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> keeps in its statement cache. Consider raising this number if statement preparation is taking too much time.

seg-source.mrk: This property controls the number of precompiled statements which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> keeps in its statement cache.
Consider raising this number if statement preparation is taking too much time.

target.mrk: This property controls the number of precompiled statements which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> keeps in its statement cache.
Consider raising this number if statement preparation is taking too much time.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the statement cache, see "Using the statement cache" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information on the statement cache, see "Using the statement cache" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph>.

target.mrk: For more information on the statement cache, see "Using the statement cache" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

seg-source.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

target.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.
